data.name: Fantasy Grounds - ArcKnight Tokens - The Grove
data.detailed_description:
Arcknight Tokens - The Grove


Elves, Druids, Nature Spirits, Hunters, Wolves, Bears, Lycanthrope, Elementals and much more!

The Grove is a 62 piece core set of forest-themed art. Each piece comes with a Hero Portrait as well.

This set includes:

  • Bear
  • Centaur (2 types)
  • Drider
  • Druid (4 types)
  • Twisted Druid (4 types)
  • Wild Druid
  • Dryad
  • Earth Elemental
  • Elf (14 types)
  • Forest Spirit (7 types)
  • Fox
  • Hawk
  • Hunter (6 types)
  • Huntress (3 types)
  • Nixie (2 types)
  • Nymph
  • Forest Ogre
  • Panther
  • Spider (2 types)
  • Giant Spider
  • Treant (3 types)
  • Werewolf (2 types)
  • Wolf (4 types)

Requires: An active subscription or 1-time standard or Ultimate license of Fantasy Grounds and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
